name: Awakening (itch) (Camilla Shen)
description:
After waking up in a strangely familiar room,  you slowly discover bits and pieces of memory through actions that may or may not tell you who you are...

Somewhat a game, somewhat a metaphor,  somewhat a contemplation session of human consciousness and reality itself~

Note: Do not use the back arrow! If you come across a black screen, scroll :)
